name: Fall Blues
description:
It is my first game ever. It is not too pretty and so on, but can provide some fun. This game is about a lonley leaf who want to find warm home before winter or worms will kill him.  Help him!

Use WSAD to control leaf. Ice while freezing (by night) and a worm can kill you. 

Find the beach to win. It is not easy, but arrows will help you. Good luck!
